snippet.title: COAG approves mental health approach
snippet.content: Eating disorders and suicide prevention measures are at the centre of a new national mental health care approach. State and federal government health officials approved the Fifth National Mental Health Plan at a COAG Health Council meeting in Brisbane on Friday. Federal Health Minister Greg Hunt said it stood out from previous plans with its focus on eating disorders and suicide prevention, keys areas that had been raised by lobbyists. Originally published as
